whatDoIneedToPlay.title: What do I need to play Piggy Breaker?
text: Here’s what you need to get started:
A computer or laptop running the desktop version of Chrome or Firefox
Metamask, a digital wallet used specifically with web apps
Ether, a form of digital payment that powers Piggy Breaker

installingMetamaskYourWallet.title: Installing Metamask, your digital wallet
text: To use Piggy Breaker, you will need to install Metamask, a digital wallet. You will need to put money in it to make your first purchase.
Note: A digital wallet like Metamask acts like a bank account—treat it with respect and make sure you don’t forget your password or the seed words.

whyMetamaskIsLocked.title: Why is Metamask locked?
text: Occasionally the Piggy Breaker homepage displays a lock screen. This happens because Metamask automatically locks your account after a certain period of time. To unlock simply click on the Metamask extension and type in your password.

reinstallingMetamask.title: Reinstalling MetaMask
text: Some users need to uninstall and reinstall Metamask because they’ve experienced a bug. If you kept your seed words, this is very easy! Just delete the extension, reinstall it, and import your twelve seed words. Then your account information will automatically display again on the Piggy Breaker website.

gettingEtherYourDigitalCurrency.title: Getting Ether, your digital currency
text: For U.S. citizens only: you can buy ether (ETH) in Metamask. ETH is a digital currency that enables our game to run.

For everyone else: you will need to purchase ETH from an exchange, and then transfer the ETH from your exchange wallet to your Metamask wallet. Unfortunately, you cannot play Piggy Breaker with only an exchange account.
You cannot use USD/CAD to play Piggy Breaker — currencies need to be converted into ETH first.

howToSendEtherToMetamask.title: How to send ETH to Metamask
text: For U.S. citizens only: you can purchase ETH directly from the Metamask wallet using the Coinbase widget. This is more convenient and doesn’t require you to create two accounts.

For everyone else: you need to buy ETH from an exchange using normal fiat currency. Copy your Metamask address by clicking on the large '...' next to your account, then select 'Copy Address to clipboard'. Go to your exchange, click 'Accounts', and select your ETH Wallet and click 'send'. Paste the Metamask address in the box with the amount you'd like to transfer.

whatisPiggyBreaker.title: What is Piggy Breaker?
text: Piggy Breaker is the next world lottery!
The game is centered around Billy, a nice little Piggy bank where everyone can contribute with ether (ETH) to let it grow... and grow... and grow... until it reaches very large amounts.
Someday the Piggy bank will break and make one of the players rich...

whocanplayPiggyBreaker.title: Who can play Piggy Breaker?
text: Anyone.*
*Nevertheless, the App is not intended for children under 13.

whydoineedtoplay.title: Why do I need to play Piggy Breaker?
text: The Piggy contains (or will contain) a lot of ether (ETH). You can follow its value, it is indicated in the middle of the homepage.
Some day, the Piggy will be broken. A winner will then be chosen “randomly” between all contributors to win content of the Piggy.
Get a chance to be this winner by playing Piggy Breaker!

whataremychancesofwinning.title: What are my chances of winning?
text: You’re the one who decides. The more you contribute, the more your chances are of winning. Indeed, your chances of winning the lottery are proportional to the total amount of your contributions.

whodecidestobreak.title: Who decides to break the Piggy?
text: Anyone can potentially break the Piggy. But it is protected by TWO RULES:
*After 3 months of existence, the Piggy is not protected by this rule anymore.

whatistheprerequisite.title: What is the prerequisite to play Piggy Breaker?
text: You need to have the Metamask plugin installed on your web browser.
Your Metamask account needs to contain ether (ETH).
NB: If you don’t have ether (ETH) on a Metamask account, please report to the first section of the FAQ.

howdoiplay.title: How do I play Piggy Breaker?
text: Just press the big yellow “Contribute” button, indicate the amount of your contribution and click “Confirm”.
This will open the Metamask plugin. Confirm the ether transaction and that’s it.
NB: If you don’t have ether (ETH) on Metamask, please report to the first section of the FAQ.

whatistheminimumtoplay.title: What is the minimum amount to play Piggy Breaker?
text: The value of the minimum contribution to play Piggy Breaker is indicated below the 'Contribute' button.
The minimum contribution can go up or down with time. It increases when the frequency of player contributions increases.

howdoibreak.title: How do I break the Piggy?
text: Press the big 'Break the Piggy' button. This will open the Metamask plugin. Confirm the transaction and that’s it.
PS: the Piggy is protected by TWO RULES:
Only a contributor can break it.
The Piggy is protected for 5 minutes after each contribution. *
*After 3 months of existence, the Piggy is not protected by this rule anymore.

whathappenswhenbroken.title: What happens once the Piggy is broken?
text: A Piggy reparation fee is paid to the programmer at the end of the game. The broken Piggy is replaced by a new empty Piggy.

howdoiknowwhowon.title: How do I know who won the lottery?
text: The winner is kept secret for a short time once the Piggy gets broken. Due to security reasons we can't detail here, the winner becomes public once the next lottery has really started e.g. once the next lottery contains at least one contribution.

whysocomplicated.title: Why is it so complicated to get started with Piggy Breaker?
text: Piggy Breaker is built on blockchain technology, which is relatively new stuff. It’s safe and secure, but it’s going to be a little complicated until the rest of the world catches up.

whatisether.title: What’s ether (ETH)? Why do I need it to play Piggy Breaker?
text: Ether powers the Ethereum network, which is what Piggy Breaker is built on. Ether acts like any other currency; the value fluctuates with the market.
You need to convert your currency (e.g. USD, CAD, GBP, etc.) into ether to pay for things on our network.

whatisgas.title: What is 'gas'?
text: 'Gas' is a shorthand used to describe the cost of powering a transaction or contract in Ethereum, which is the blockchain network that Piggy Breaker is built on.

Because blockchain is decentralized, every transaction is distributed through multiple computers, not a central server. This ensures each transaction—is secure and one-of-a-kind. However, it also takes more computational power, which is covered by the cost of gas. Ethereum typically communicates this cost in gwei (1 million gwei = 1 ether/ETH). You can get a more detailed explanation here.

caniuseacard.title: Can I use a Credit Card to play Piggy Breaker?
text: Not directly; the technology simply isn’t there yet. As soon as it is, we plan to support it.
However, most exchanges do let you buy ether with a credit card.

caniplaywithphone.title: Can I play Piggy Breaker with my phone?
text: Not yet. Piggy Breaker relies on technologies that simply don’t function on mobile devices, like Metamask.
We are developing a mobile app, but you will need a laptop, desktop, or tablet browser to complete transactions for the foreseeable future.

howareyoumakingmoney.title: How are you making money with Piggy Breaker?
text: We take 3.75% of the Piggy value when the Piggy gets broken. Note that we are working hard to make your game as easy as possible to use and to prepare you a mobile version.

howdoireach.title: How do I reach the Piggy Breaker team regarding a project, partnership, or investment opportunity?
text: Give us the details here and we’ll be in touch.
If none of the above has been helpful, please contact us with the details of your issue at
Please include any relevant tx hashes, links, and Piggy IDs so we can support you as quickly as possible.
